0.0.1.name: wordpress/genesis-simple-defaults
0.0.1.description:
Simple Defaults allows you to set some of the more common default items in Genesis Theme Frameworks including: Favicon, Comment Reply Title and Default post image fallback

We are open to suggestions on other defaults to add to the plugin, please leave a comment on http://www.hitreach.co.uk/wordpress-plugins/simple-defaults/ with your suggestion.
